stimulusHtml:
Listen to the excerpt.


Which of the following statements correctly describes the key relationships heard?
choicesHtml: The excerpt begins in major and shifts to the relative minor.
The excerpt begins in minor and shifts to the relative major.
The excerpt begins in major, shifts to the relative minor, and then shifts back to major again.
The excerpt begins in minor, shifts to the relative major, and then shifts back to minor again.
